title: Darkness, I Am
description: Dana Allen's unnatural ability to dream of the impending deaths of those around her is anything but a gift, but her latest dream is a blur. After a harrowing car accident, she finds herself alone, injured and terrified, on a dark and secluded stretch of highway. Bleeding from the wreck, and haunted by a face she can't quite see, she sets out in search of answers, and sanctuary from a growing storm.
author: Anthony Parker
